messages.message:
fyi I was able to deploy Ray (https://www.ray.io/) into our aws sandbox. Seem like Ray works with Kubernetes now :slightly_smiling_face:

```joshxie@Joshs-MBP charts % KUBECONFIG=./tmp  kubectl -n ray get pods                   
NAME                                    READY   STATUS    RESTARTS   AGE
example-cluster-ray-head-type-d998k     1/1     Running   0          9h
example-cluster-ray-worker-type-rmhs9   1/1     Running   0          9h
example-cluster-ray-worker-type-twvqz   1/1     Running   0          9h```
